response.raw_message_text:
```json
{
  "risk_factors": [
    ("age (20)", "low", "Young age is generally associated with lower recidivism rates."),
    ("race/ethnicity (White)", "medium", "Race can be a factor, but its impact varies; moderate weight due to potential societal biases and disparities."),
    ("prior arrests (1 time), conviction", "high", "A prior arrest and conviction significantly increase the risk of future offenses."),
    ("height/weight range (6'1\", 150-174 lbs.)", "low", "Physical characteristics are not strong predictors on their own."),
    ("marital status (never married, living with others)", "medium", "Living alone is associated with lower recidivism; non-aloneness adds some risk but moderate weight."),
    ("education level (high school diploma, no college enrollment)", "low", "Basic education completion has a modest protective effect against future criminality."),
    ("employment status (no jobs in the year)", "medium-high", "Unemployment is a strong predictor of recidivism; significant impact."),
    ("drug use history (marijuana and cocaine within 4 years, recent depression symptoms)", "high", "Substance abuse and mental health issues are major risk factors for rearrest."),
    ("family background (lived with biological mother in rural area, household size 4)", "medium-low", "Family structure and early environment have some influence but less critical than other factors."),
    ("spiritual beliefs (God's role denial)", "low-medium", "Spirituality can affect resilience; lack of belief may slightly increase risk.")
  ],
  "prediction": "YES",
  "confidence": 75
}
```

prompt.system:
You are a highly experienced criminal justice risk assessment expert
employing advanced statistical and judicial knowledge.
prompt.user:
You are a criminal risk assessment expert. Step back, take a deep breath and carefully think step by step to assign a relative weight [low, medium, high] to each risk factor before using them to collectively predict 3-year rearrest recidivism:
The person is a 20-year-old male who identifies himself as White. He has been arrested 1 time and has been convicted. He is 6 feet 1 inch and weighs between 150 and 174 lbs. He has never been married and is currently not living alone. He has a high school diploma and is not enrolled in college. He has held no jobs during the year. He has used drugs in the past four years (marijuana and cocaine) and some of the time during the past month he has felt so down in the dumps that nothing could cheer him up. At a young age, he lived with his biological mother in a household of size 4, in a rural area. He considers that God has nothing to do with what happens to him personally.

After your analysis, you must respond ONLY with a JSON object in exactly this format, with no additional text:

{
  "risk_factors": [
    ("factor1", "low"|"medium"|"high", "textual reasoning"),
    ("factor2", "low"|"medium"|"high", "textual reasoning"),
    ...
  ],
  "prediction": "YES" or "NO",
  "confidence": number between 0 and 100
}
